participant_2.background:
I'm glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer.
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i am a student.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

content.text: Hey I'm doing alright! I'm excited for the weather to get warmer so I can spend more time outside.
Yeah me too! I'm tired of having to drive so far to work.
I work in the city, so it's a bit of a commute.
Oh that's rough. I work at a coffee shop in the suburbs, so it's a lot closer to home.
I'm glad you have a shorter commute! What are your hobbies?
I like to play soccer, and I love to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.
Oh that's cool! I wish I was more coordinated, I would love to play soccer.
It's never too late to learn! I started playing when I was in high school.
Maybe I'll give it a try! What kind of hairstyles do you like to do?
I like to do a lot of different styles, but I'm really into braids right now.
Oh nice! I've always wanted to learn how to braid hair.
It's not too hard, there are a lot of tutorials online.
